cons: Some projects only focus on maintaining good burn rate

review_title: The Vietnam office has many internal management and funding problems
pros: Friendly colleague, easy going environment, good cook for lunch at office, good for some fresh graduates seeking for English speaking environment but cannot get into a proper corporate one.
cons: Unprofessional staffs, decrease in international funding, managers lack of management capacity, highly politics in some department and in senior management level.

pros: Great organization for children. You are motivated by through working directly with children. Transparency.
cons: Quite complicated in term of policies
